1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2{-# LANGUAGE ScopedTypeVariables #-}
3
4-- | Gadgets with content calculation.
5
6module Koshucode.Baala.Rop.Cox.Gadget
7  ( ropsCoxGadget,
8  
9    -- * number
10    consConst, relmapConst, relkitConst,
11
12    -- * number
13    consNumber, relmapNumber, relkitNumber,
14  
15    -- * rank
16    consRank,
17    relmapGapRank, relkitGapRank,
18    relmapDenseRank, relkitDenseRank,
19  
20    -- * repeat
21    consRepeat,
22  ) where
23
24import Prelude hiding (getContents)
25import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture           as O
26import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base               as B
27import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax             as S
28import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data               as D
29import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Core               as C
30import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Rop.Base           as Op
31import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Rop.Cox.Get        as Op
32import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Rop.Cox.GeoDatumJp as Op
33import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Rop.Cox.Message    as Msg
34
35
36-- | Implementation of relational operators.
37ropsCoxGadget :: (D.CContent c) => [C.Rop c]
38ropsCoxGadget = Op.ropList "cox-gadget"
39    --       CONSTRUCTOR    USAGE                            ATTRIBUTE
40    [ Op.def consConst      "const R"                        "-lit"
41    , Op.def consGeoDatumJp "geo-datum-jp E E E -to /N /N"   "-n -x -y . -to"
42    , Op.def consGeoDegree  "geo-degree /N /P /P /P"         "-real -deg -min -sec"
43    , Op.def consInterp     "interp E"                       "-interp . -x?"
44    , Op.def consNumber     "number /N -order /P ..."        "-term . -order? -from?"
45    , Op.def consRank       "rank /N -order /P ..."          "-term . -order? -from? -dense?"
46    , Op.def consRepeat     "repeat I R"                     "-count -relmap/"
47    ]
48
49
50-- ----------------------  const
51
52-- | __const E__
53--
54--   Output the constant relation E.
55--   Especially, @const {= [] =}@ is equivalent to @dee@,
56--   @const {= =}@ is equivalent to @dum@.
57--
58consConst :: (D.CContent c) => C.RopCons c
59consConst med =
60    do lit <- Op.getContent med "-lit"
61       case D.isRel lit of
62         True  -> Right $ relmapConst med $ D.gRel lit
63         False -> Msg.reqRel
64
65-- | Create @const@ relmap.
66relmapConst :: C.Intmed c -> D.Rel c -> C.Relmap c
67relmapConst med = C.relmapFlow med . relkitConst
68
69-- | Create @const@ relkit.
70relkitConst :: D.Rel c -> C.RelkitFlow c
71relkitConst _ Nothing = Right C.relkitNothing
72relkitConst (D.Rel he bo) _ = Right kit2 where
73    kit2 = C.relkitJust he $ C.RelkitConst bo
74
75
76-- ----------------------  geo-datum-jp
77
78--  geo-datum-jp /n /x /y -to /lat /long
79
80consGeoDatumJp :: (Ord c, D.CContent c) => C.RopCons c
81consGeoDatumJp med =
82    do n  <- Op.getCox med "-n"
83       x  <- Op.getCox med "-x"
84       y  <- Op.getCox med "-y"
85       (lat, long) <- Op.getTerm2 med "-to"
86       let cops = C.globalCopset $ C.ropGlobal med
87       Right $ relmapGeoDatumJp med (cops, (n,x,y), (lat,long))
88
89-- | Create @geo-datum-jp@ relmap.
90relmapGeoDatumJp :: (Ord c, D.CContent c) => C.Intmed c -> (D.CopSet c, D.Cox3 c, S.TermName2) -> C.Relmap c
91relmapGeoDatumJp med = C.relmapFlow med . relkitGeoDatumJp
92
93-- | Create @geo-datum-jp@ relkit.
94relkitGeoDatumJp :: (Ord c, D.CContent c) => (D.CopSet c, D.Cox3 c, S.TermName2) -> C.RelkitFlow c
95relkitGeoDatumJp _ Nothing = Right C.relkitNothing
96relkitGeoDatumJp (cops, (coxn,coxx,coxy), (lat,long)) (Just he1) = Right kit2 where
97    he2       = D.headAppend [lat, long] he1
98    kit2      = C.relkitJust he2 $ C.RelkitOneToAbOne False f2 []
99    pReal     = D.pDec . D.realDecimal 4
100
101    f2 _ cs   = do cn    <- D.coxRunCox cops he1 cs coxn
102                   cx    <- D.coxRunCox cops he1 cs coxx
103                   cy    <- D.coxRunCox cops he1 cs coxy
104
105                   decn  <- D.getDec $ Right cn
106                   decx  <- D.getDec $ Right cx
107                   decy  <- D.getDec $ Right cy
108
109                   let n  = fromInteger $ D.decimalNum decn
110                       dx = D.decimalFractional decx :: Double
111                       dy = D.decimalFractional decy :: Double
112                       (dlat, dlong) = Op.convDegree n (dx, dy)
113
114                   Right $ pReal dlat : pReal dlong : cs
115
116
117-- ----------------------  geo-degree
118
119--  geo-degree /deg-real /deg /min /sec
120
121consGeoDegree :: (Ord c, D.CContent c) => C.RopCons c
122consGeoDegree med =
123    do real <- Op.getTerm med "-real"
124       deg  <- Op.getTerm med "-deg"
125       mnt  <- Op.getTerm med "-min"
126       sec  <- Op.getTerm med "-sec"
127       Right $ relmapGeoDegree med (real, deg, mnt, sec)
128
129-- | Create @geo-degree@ relmap.
130relmapGeoDegree :: (Ord c, D.CContent c) => C.Intmed c -> S.TermName4 -> C.Relmap c
131relmapGeoDegree med = C.relmapFlow med . relkitGeoDegree
132
133-- | Create @geo-degree@ relkit.
134relkitGeoDegree :: (Ord c, D.CContent c) => S.TermName4 -> C.RelkitFlow c
135relkitGeoDegree _ Nothing = Right C.relkitNothing
136relkitGeoDegree (real, deg, mnt, sec) (Just he1) = Right kit2 where
137    he2       = D.headCons real he1
138    kit2      = C.relkitJust he2 $ C.RelkitOneToAbOne False f2 []
139    pick      = D.picker [deg, mnt, sec] he1
140    pReal     = D.pDec . D.realDecimal 4
141
142    f2 _ cs   = do let [cdeg, cmnt, csec] = pick cs
143
144                   hdeg <- D.getDec $ Right cdeg
145                   hmnt <- D.getDec $ Right cmnt
146                   hsec <- D.getDec $ Right csec
147
148                   let ddeg = D.decimalFractional hdeg :: Double
149                       dmnt = D.decimalFractional hmnt :: Double
150                       dsec = D.decimalFractional hsec :: Double
151                       dmnt' = dmnt + dsec  / 60
152                       ddeg' = ddeg + dmnt' / 60
153
154                   Right $ pReal ddeg' : cs
155
156
157-- ----------------------  interp
158
159consInterp :: (D.CContent c) => C.RopCons c
160consInterp med =
161    do skip <- Op.getSwitch med "-x"
162       case skip of
163         True  -> Right $ Op.relmapId med
164         False -> consInterp2 med
165
166consInterp2 :: (D.CContent c) => C.RopCons c
167consInterp2 med =
168    do c <- Op.getContent med "-interp"
169       case D.isInterp c of
170         True  -> Right $ relmapInterp med $ D.gInterp c
171         False -> Msg.reqInterp
172
173-- | Create @interp@ relmap.
174relmapInterp :: (D.CContent c) => C.Intmed c -> D.Interp -> C.Relmap c
175relmapInterp med = C.relmapFlow med . relkitInterp
176
177-- | Create @interp@ relkit.
178relkitInterp :: (D.CContent c) => D.Interp -> C.RelkitFlow c
179relkitInterp _ Nothing = Right C.relkitNothing
180relkitInterp interp (Just he1)
181    | interpMatch interp he1 = Right $ C.relkitJust he1 C.RelkitId
182    | otherwise              = Msg.unkTerm (D.interpTerms interp) he1
183
184interpMatch :: D.Interp -> D.Head -> Bool
185interpMatch interp he = ns1 == ns2 where
186    ns1 = B.sort $ D.interpTerms interp
187    ns2 = B.sort $ D.getTermNames he
188
189
190-- ----------------------  number
191
192-- | __number \/N -from I -order \/P ...__
193consNumber :: (Ord c, D.CContent c) => C.RopCons c
194consNumber med =
195    do n    <- Op.getTerm                        med "-term"
196       ns   <- Op.getOption [] Op.getSignedTerms med "-order"
197       from <- Op.getOption 0  Op.getInt         med "-from"
198       Right $ relmapNumber med (n, ns, fromInteger from)
199
200-- | Create @number@ relmap.
201relmapNumber :: (D.CDec c, Ord c) => C.Intmed c -> (S.TermName, [S.TermName], Int) -> C.Relmap c
202relmapNumber med = C.relmapFlow med . relkitNumber
203
204-- | Create @number@ relkit.
205relkitNumber :: (Ord c, D.CDec c) => (S.TermName, [S.TermName], Int) -> C.RelkitFlow c
206relkitNumber = relkitRanking B.sortByNameNumbering
207
208relkitRanking
209    :: (Ord c, D.CDec c)
210    => B.Ranking S.TermName c
211    -> (S.TermName, [S.TermName], Int) -> C.RelkitFlow c
212relkitRanking _ _ Nothing = Right C.relkitNothing
213relkitRanking ranking (n, ns, from) (Just he1) = Right kit2 where
214    he2   = D.headCons n he1
215    kit2  = C.relkitJust he2 $ C.RelkitFull False kitf2
216    kitf2 bo1 = let (rank, bo2) = ranking from ords (D.getTermNames he1) bo1
217                in zipWith (:) (map D.pInt rank) bo2
218    ords  = (B.orderingCap . S.orderingTermName) <$> ns
219
220
221-- ----------------------  rank
222
223-- | [rank \/N -from I -order \/P ...]
224--     Calculate standard competition ranking (like 1224).
225--
226--   [rank \/N -dense -from I -order \/P...]
227--     Calculate dense ranking (like 1223).
228--
229consRank :: (Ord c, D.CContent c) => C.RopCons c
230consRank med =
231    do n     <- Op.getTerm               med "-term"
232       ns    <- Op.getSignedTerms        med "-order"
233       from  <- Op.getOption 0 Op.getInt med "-from"
234       dense <- Op.getSwitch             med "-dense"
235       let relmapRank = if dense
236                        then relmapDenseRank
237                        else relmapGapRank
238       Right $ relmapRank med (n, ns, fromInteger from)
239
240-- | Create @rank -dense@ relmap.
241relmapDenseRank :: (D.CDec c, Ord c) =>
242   C.Intmed c -> (S.TermName, [S.TermName], Int) -> C.Relmap c
243relmapDenseRank med = C.relmapFlow med . relkitDenseRank
244
245-- | Create @rank -dense@ relkit.
246relkitDenseRank :: (Ord c, D.CDec c) => (S.TermName, [S.TermName], Int) -> C.RelkitFlow c
247relkitDenseRank = relkitRanking B.sortByNameDenseRank
248
249-- | Create @rank@ relmap.
250relmapGapRank :: (D.CDec c, Ord c) =>
251   C.Intmed c -> (S.TermName, [S.TermName], Int) -> C.Relmap c
252relmapGapRank med = C.relmapFlow med . relkitGapRank
253
254-- | Create @rank@ relkit.
255relkitGapRank :: (Ord c, D.CDec c) => (S.TermName, [S.TermName], Int) -> C.RelkitFlow c
256relkitGapRank = relkitRanking B.sortByNameGapRank
257
258
259-- ----------------------  repeat
260
261-- | __repeat I R__
262consRepeat :: (Ord c, D.CContent c) => C.RopCons c
263consRepeat med =
264  do cnt  <- Op.getInt    med "-count"
265     rmap <- Op.getRelmap med "-relmap"
266     Right $ relmapRepeat med cnt rmap
267
268-- | Create @repeat@ relmap.
269relmapRepeat :: (Ord c) => C.Intmed c -> Integer -> O.Map (C.Relmap c)
270relmapRepeat med cnt = C.relmapBinary med $ relkitRepeat cnt
271
272-- | Create @repeat@ relkit.
273relkitRepeat :: forall c. (Ord c) => Integer -> C.RelkitBinary c
274relkitRepeat cnt (C.Relkit _ (Just he2) kitb2) (Just he1)
275    | D.headEquiv he1 he2 = Right $ kit3
276    | otherwise = Msg.diffHead [he1, he2]
277    where
278    kit3 = C.relkitJust he1 $ C.RelkitAbFull True kitf3 [kitb2]
279    kitf3 bmaps bo1 =
280        do let [bmap2] = bmaps
281               bmap2'  = C.bmapAlign he2 he1 bmap2
282           bo2 <- rep bmap2' cnt bo1
283           Right bo2
284
285    rep bmap2' = loop where
286        loop c bo | c > 0     = loop (c - 1) =<< bmap2' bo
287                  | otherwise = Right bo
288
289relkitRepeat _ _ _ = Right C.relkitNothing
